WorkItem.ClosedComment: You can find the solution in the comment.
WorkItem.Description:
There is a problem if you add a mouse click event on a vertex control.
The event is correctly fired, but at the end of the event the vertex is not released and it stay attached to the mouse pointer until you click another time.

Comments.Message:
Try this one: in your event handler of your mouse click event say that e.Handled = false
I'm not sure, that it will work, but you should try this one.
